EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-27-Field-East-ESB-Nashville.Marketing Invitation 1.EMAIL - Marketing
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Nashville Predators vs Minnesota Wild
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco in Nashville for a presentation on workload automation at the Bridgestone Arena followed by an evening of hockey as the Nashville Predators take on the Minnesota Wild. Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads happy. While you can't automate people, your can automate workloads, and accelerate business growth.
Executive Networking Series Nashville Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud Nashville Predators vs Minnesota Wild Tuesday, March 27th | Bridgestone Arena | 5:00 p.m.
Join your peers for the next stop in our Executive Networking Series to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud. Save the date for March 27th at 5:00 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville/]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
